title: How Wes Anderson inspired Tyler The Creator

media:group.media:title: How Wes Anderson inspired Tyler The Creator
media:group.media:description:
Is Tyler The Creator going to make a movie one day? We'll let's find out! In this video essay I will be analyzing a lot of music videos and commercials from different stages of Tyler's career and putting them into a cinema historic context. Because if you look closely, there are references to movies such as The Grand Budapest Hotel, Call Me By Your Name and even older movies such as those of French Filmmaker Jean Luc-Godard. So let's dive into the cinematic world of Mr. Baudelaire, aka Tyler The Creator.

Story, narration and editing by Eloi du Cinema. 
- My instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eloiducinema/ 
- Business Inquiries: ducinemaofficial@gmail.com

0:00 Intro: Who is Wes Anderson?
0:51 Call Me If You Get Lost 
2:52 WOLF, Flower Boy and IGOR
4:42 Tyler the "Auteur"?
